name: 10 Block King
description:
The brain game that improves your concentration puzzle game that anyone can enjoy.

[Features]
- Classic mode: You can remove the block and record the competition.
- Stage Mode: You can proceed to stage 200 step by step.
- Arcade Mode: You can call the following blocks of two-step to enjoy the game.
- Time mode: Remove many of blocks in the limited time and a competitive game record.
- Multiplayer: Two people can enjoy the game via the online war.
- Convenient user interface and easy operation.
- Support for 16 languages.
- fun game, free game, no wifi, no internet
